name.pehl.gwt.piriti.client.xml
Interface XmlRegistry

All Known Implementing Classes:
XmlRegistryImpl
public interface XmlRegistry

A registry for XmlReaders. All XmlReaders are registered against this registry. This way nested types can be mapped.

Version:
$LastChangedRevision: 8 $
Author:
$LastChangedBy: harald.pehl $
